body.p: Wine 0.9.37 was released today, with the following main changes:

ul.li: The usual assortment of Direct3D fixes.
Support for a few more exe protection schemes.

body.p: Binary packages are in the process of being built and it may take a few days for them to appear, but the source is available now. You can find out more about this release in the announcement. Check out our download page for packages for your distribution.
